title: Ep118: Royal Norfolk Regiment - Battle of Kohima Part 4
itunes:title: Ep118: Royal Norfolk Regiment - Battle of Kohima Part 4
description:
In their final instalment of this special series, Pete and Gary finish the story of the RNR in the Battle of Kohima.


Presenters: Peter Hart and Gary Bain

Publisher: Mat McLachlan

Producer: Jess Stebnicki


Become a member to listen ad-free for only £2 per month: https://plus.acast.com/s/pete-and-garys-military-history
